item.title: About
item.description: When it comes to protecting your interests you need an attorney that is there for you, communicates with you, and treats you like a valued customer. Whether you are facing difficult circumstances now, or you are planning for the future, your lawyer should work for you. As a sole practitioner I devote my time and energy to my clients. I pride myself on being available, easy to talk to, and responding promptly to my clientsâ€™ phone calls and requests.
